column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////This is a fantastic bakery!!  I go here for the baguette and croissants.  The croissants are super flaky!  They look big but they're not dense.  The almond and chocolate are the best!  However
column2: they sell out by lunch time so come early.  The food is good but the line is ridiculous.  I wish they have a line for people wanting to pick up some pastries and leave.  I would give 5 stars for the food but deducting 1 for the super long wait.
